name: Native Strings "Secrets Of The Sea, Whispers Of The Land"
description:
With their first full length album Secrets Of The Sea, Whispers Of The Land The, Native Strings has weaved an impressive album out of dramatic folk tales and earnest rock songs.

If you are not already familiar with the group, Native Strings is a collaboration between two friends. Native Strings emulates the sounds of the contemporary folk and math rock scenes yet so many other inspirations and ideas make their way in to their songs.

Would recommend for fans of Tegan and Sara, Arctic Monkeys, Wolf Parade, and I Would Set My Self On Fire For You.

name: The Upstairs Room "Pop Tart Architecture" DIGITAL
description:
An official group since 2003, The Upstairs Room has been releasing mashup albums as The Upstairs Room and more symphonic compositions as The Downstairs Room for several years, building up quite the following on several web sites. Their song Barry Gray Mix was featured by a radio station in Akron, Ohio.

Pop Tart Architecture dabbles in a variety of musical styles, balancing sporadic synths and quirky rock hooks throughout and using plenty of contemporary music samples.

name: Ask About It Productions Sampler "Ask"
description:
Ask About It Productions is a production company founded in 2007 in Ohio by Corey Sheppard and Bobby White. These talented musicians bring to the table many dissimilar musical styles and ideas. With impressive musical talent and attuned ears as well as an exceptional versatility, this duo will capture the industry by storm.

Ask showcases five completed songs but also features five hooks and five beats all written entirely by the producers.

If you are an musician or label and would like a copy of the album at no cost, please contact Warawara.

name: Affiliates The "The Return" CD
description:
The Return tells the story of a man that is diagnosed with cancer and ultimately dies. It is a story about his physical battle, his emotional pain, his opposition to dying, and his fear of the unknown. The four movements represent four nightmares: the man dreams these nightmares over the course of the last four days of his life. Each song is supposed to represent different aspects of these four nightmares.

With scattered clips of spoken audio as well as distinctive noises and sampled instruments thoughout, this album makes for a both interesting and evocative listen.

If you are hearing the band for the first time, Affiliates The is a one man band heavily influenced by Ooioo, Black Flag, and Wolf Parade. Most of the musical endeavors of this electroacoustic outfit are massively lengthy albums, such as The Return, which present stories through expressive sounds and complex musical phrases.

name: Crow Chief "Skeleton" DIGITAL
description:
Crow Chief is an experiment in electronics, percussion, and ambience.

This debut sounds like Kit Clayton or the band The Knife.
